official-title.#text:
To prohibit the sale or trade to another community of
		  community development block grant award amounts.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Ensuring Proper Community Investments
			 Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Prohibition on
			 sale or trade of Community Development Block Grant awards

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following new subsection:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 105 of the Housing and Community
			 Development Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Housing and Community Development Act of 1974/s:105

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not
				sell, trade, or otherwise transfer all or any portion of such amounts to or for
				any other metropolitan city, urban county, unit of general local government,
				Indian tribe or insular
				area.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Housing and Community Development Act of 1974/s:106/ss:d

text.#text:
A
				metropolitan city, urban county, unit of general local government, or Indian
				tribe, or insular area that receives a grant of amounts under this title from
				the Secretary or through a State allocation pursuant to

header.#text:
Prohibition on
				sale or trade of awards

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall issue any regulations
			 necessary to carry out
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Housing and Urban Development

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , as added by the amendment made by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 105(i) of the Housing and Community Development
			 Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Housing and Community Development Act of 1974/s:105/ss:i

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
of this section,
			 not later than the expiration of the 90-day period beginning on the date of the
			 enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Ensuring Proper Community Investments Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a
